description: React hook for utilizing browser speech recognition API to convert speech to text, providing start and stop control functions and managing recognition state and transcript.

methods.name: useSpeechRecognition()
methods.description: React hook that provides speech recognition capabilities, managing recognition state and transcript, handling start and stop listening functions.

methods.name: startListening
methods.description: Initiates speech recognition session if supported, resets transcript, sets recognition language, and updates listening state.

methods.name: stopListening
methods.description: Terminates ongoing speech recognition session if active, and updates listening state.
